articles.title: Paul DeJong's 10th inning RBI double lifts Cardinals to a series victory in Chicago - St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.description: Paul DeJong hit an RBI double to drive in the winning run as the Cardinals defeated the White Sox in the rubber match of their three-game series.
articles.content: CHICAGO  Paul DeJongs second hit of the day, an RBI double rifled into the left field corner, drove in the go-ahead run in the 10th inning and it proved the difference as the Cardinals escaped the Wi… [+12098 chars]
